website_summaries.verdict: Inexpensive way to add an island feel to tabletops while keeping bugs away from drinks.
pros: Rare bamboo version of tabletop torches
Can be used indoors with electric candles
Convenient 8-pack adds ambiance to outdoor festivities
cons: To ensure a clumsy drinker doesn't accidentally knock over torch, weigh each down with rocks

customer_reviews.title: We bought some small bean bags and stuffed them in the bottom which made them perfect! Without the bean bags
customer_reviews.text: These are a bit light weight. We bought some small bean bags and stuffed them in the bottom which made them perfect! Without the bean bags, they might be prone to tipping over. Will definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Angie Heaton

customer_reviews.title: Luckily it went out when it fell but that could have turned real bad. Completely my fault
customer_reviews.text: Careful with these. I had one that had some overflow that spilled down the side during filling and didn't realize it. It caught on fire about an hour after lighting (assuming during windy conditions) and burned the bamboo and the tank fell out. Luckily it went out when it fell but that could have turned real bad. Completely my fault. But I do not feel these are all that safe because they are pretty flimsy and made with thin bamboo.
customer_reviews.author: ISOserious

customer_reviews.title: I was very disappointed in this order
customer_reviews.text: The torches were the height as stated on the product description. However, four of the eight were not straight when set on a table. The oil cans were not in the bamboo holder straight. I can only use 4 of the 8 I ordered. I was very disappointed in this order.
customer_reviews.author: sapbears

customer_reviews.title: I am honestly not happy with these at all
customer_reviews.text: I am honestly not happy with these at all. I only gave it 3 stars, because it is a great idea and it looked good for the first 10 minutes. You have to tape these to the table in order to keep them from tipping over. They ended up burning the sides of the tiki torch and now I am unable to use them again. I would love to purchase some better quality ones to use in our outdoor patio at our brewery. I would not purchase these unless you perfectly pour the fuel into the tiki torch and watch them like a hawk.
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: these such
customer_reviews.text: these were horrible they were so top heavy once you put in the fluid they tipped over cause a table cloth to catch fire , the canisters leaked fluid all over my wedding linens and all had to be discarded wasting over $300 it was a smelly mess with fluid on everything the tiki lamps fell over at the slightest breeze or someone bumping the table very very dangerous
customer_reviews.author: cortnnie lee

customer_reviews.title: Extremely lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Super light, I'm going to attach the bottoms to small weight plates so they won't get blown or knocked over by the pool. I can see them toppling over after I fill it with the fluid.
customer_reviews.author: Debi N

customer_reviews.title: Ok but not the best
customer_reviews.text: The torches are very unbalanced and become top heavy once filled with fuel. Be cautious they can blow over very easily.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan B.

customer_reviews.title: Better off just burning money
customer_reviews.text: Pretty crappy. Going to put oil on them later and see if they hold fluid. I would definitely recommend them to someone I didn't like
customer_reviews.author: Ciara

customer_reviews.title: Very unsteady
customer_reviews.text: These are so poorly made they want to topple over even when empty. I would be very nervous to set them out full of fuel and burning. Returned
customer_reviews.author: Mark in S C

customer_reviews.title: Half of them were/are very crooked
customer_reviews.text: Half of them were crooked to the point that I did not even use them.
customer_reviews.author: Mickie Lee Chanley

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: They are budget tiki torches. Buy them, use them, throw them away when they die. I have had mine for about 2 months. They work and are a bit tippy if you're not careful. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Riggity

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend this product. My order was completely defective. There was no way for me to open any of the torches to put the fuel. was not able to use it. It was a waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Luneda Dortch

customer_reviews.title: Super sad about this product
customer_reviews.text: I was super excited when I ordered, but I’m going to be honest it was a waste of money. They aren’t sturdy enough and the would was cut weird to where it would fall over with any movement. I ended up having to just put them away and not even use them, yea they’re cute but I was super disappointed
customer_reviews.author: kristina rivas

customer_reviews.title: Not the best quality
customer_reviews.text: These are not the greatest quality but I guess they’re okay for the price. Several were very crooked and 2 had a black substance possibly mold on them. I’ve requested a replacement order.
customer_reviews.author: Maretta58

customer_reviews.title: They’re ok
customer_reviews.text: Careful with the wick. Keep it low. Not good if it’s windy.. it chars the sides and melts the wicker part and sometimes it chars the lid to where you need pliers to get the lid off
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Stovall

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: They’re perfect! Theyre pretty lightweight but all were standing perfectly fine and no discoloration of any like I’ve read in other reviews. I’m so happy with it and can’t wait till the day of my sons party to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Says me

customer_reviews.title: ... used them yet these are going to make a wonderful decoration. They are exactly what I expected
customer_reviews.text: We are doing a deserted island VBS theme this year and while I have not used them yet these are going to make a wonderful decoration. They are exactly what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy J Lovelace

customer_reviews.title: Snuffer caps.
customer_reviews.text: Product did NOT come with snuffer caps to extinguish the flame when done using. Also half of the torches were not straight as pictured, they were curved.
customer_reviews.author: scott wiehe

customer_reviews.title: No more mosquitos around me.
customer_reviews.text: I used the same day at nigh time outside on my patio.Save my blood from the mosquitos.😅😅
customer_reviews.author: maria Santiago

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a luau party!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Ordered them a few days prior to my event, came quick, and was An amazing touch to the table tops. Going to order more for my next party.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Decker

customer_reviews.title: I need one replaced missing the top and wick
customer_reviews.text: I want another one. Send one out since it's missing the top and wick
customer_reviews.author: Karen Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: made of good material but was very disappointed that a few came completely damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Briawna

product_meta.title: Bamboo Tiki Torches - 8 Pack - Metal Oil Canister - 14in High, 6oz. Capacity - Sturdy Table Torch by Kaya Collection
feature_bullets: ILLUMINATE YOUR SURROUNDINGS: Set the mood and add ambiance to your outdoor festivities. These real oil-burning torches create incandescent natural flames for light in any outdoor setting, making them perfect for backyard parties and celebrations.

QUALITY CONSTRUCTION: Made using a one-piece, natural bamboo shaft, these bamboo torches feature a sturdy design for long-term use. Unlike similar products, Kaya Collection offers a 100% bamboo product for better functionality and a more authentic feel of the tropics.

LONG-LASTING LIGHT: Although small in size, the refillable oil canisters are long-lasting to provide many hours of illumination and pest control. Each canister is reinforced with a metal ring to prevent tipping over or leaks, unlike cheaper quality competitor products.

MARK BOUNDARIES: Use Kaya Collection’s bamboo torches to brighten pathways or use as decor for Luau or tropical-themed parties. They are perfect for weddings, anniversaries, birthdays, barbecues, pool parties and other events.

INSECT CONTROL: Keep pesky mosquitoes and other biting insects at bay when you’re outside! To reap this benefit, fill the canisters with lemon eucalyptus essential oil, citronella, neem or another insect-repelling oil and enjoy the outdoors pest-free.

EIGHT, STURDY TABLETOP TORCHES: A great centerpiece on a patio table, this hourglass-shaped torch provides light while keeping the insects away. Each torch in the 8-pack set is 14 inches high with a 6-ounce oil capacity that burns for approximately seven hours, making it ideal for outdoor parties and events.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars57 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
